tool.name: SAGA.ta_morphometry.22
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False isArraySLOPE False isArrayCONVEXITY False isArrayTEXTURE False output_data_LANDFORMS $output_data_LANDFORMS name SAGA.ta_morphometry.22 DEM $DEM SLOPE $SLOPE CONVEXITY $CONVEXITY CONV_RECALC $CONV_RECALC TEXTURE $TEXTURE TEXT_RECALC $TEXT_RECALC TYPE $TYPE CONV_SCALE $CONV_SCALE CONV_KERNEL $CONV_KERNEL CONV_TYPE $CONV_TYPE CONV_EPSILON $CONV_EPSILON TEXT_SCALE $TEXT_SCALE TEXT_EPSILON $TEXT_EPSILON prefer $prefer response $response outputType_LANDFORMS $OutputSection_LANDFORMS.outputType_LANDFORMS transmissionMode_LANDFORMS $OutputSection_LANDFORMS.transmissionMode_LANDFORMS

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: SLOPE
param.label: Slope
param.help: Slope The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: CONVEXITY
param.label: Convexity
param.help: Convexity The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: TEXTURE
param.label: Texture
param.help: Texture The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: TEXT_EPSILON
param.label: Flat Area Threshold
param.help: maximum difference between original and median filtered elevation (3x3 moving window) that still is recognized flat

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_LANDFORMS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Terrain surface classification as proposed by Iwahashi & Pike (2007).
